projects.title: Glad2Cook.com
projects.description: Glad2Cook.com is free online grocery list that makes food shopping fast, easy and enjoyable.
projects.caption: Developed in 2010 using ASP.NET, C#, AJAX, jQuery, CSS and HTML.

projects.title: Report Catalog
projects.description: Web application for documenting, tracking and distributing thousands of reports.
projects.caption: Developed for the Chartis Division of AIG Insurance in 2009 using ASP.NET, VB.NET, jQuery, CSS and HTML.

projects.title: Chartis (AIG) Intranet
projects.description: Intranet site with user specific applications and reference/training documentation.
projects.caption: Developed for the Chartis Division of AIG Insurance in 2009 using ASP.NET, VB.NET, jQuery, CSS and HTML.

projects.title: Report Request System
projects.description: Web application for creating, tracking and processing detailed report request.
projects.caption: Developed for the Chartis Division of AIG Insurance in 2008 using ASP.NET, VB.NET, jQuery, CSS and HTML.

projects.title: QMF2Excel
projects.description: Downloads, converts and formats IBM DB2 mainframe data from QMF to MS Excel files.
projects.caption: Developed in 2008 using VB.NET.

projects.title: Beans Games
projects.description: The Beans Games are freeware games intended to help teach letters and spelling in a fun way.
projects.caption: Developed mostly in 2008 using VB.NET.

projects.title: G2C Blog
projects.description: Blogging platform, this implementation was for a blog about the creation of Glad2Cook.com.
projects.caption: Developed in 2006-2007 using ASP.NET, VB.NET, RSS, CSS and HTML.
